mapper.update: UPDATE INSTR_INFO SET EML_ADDR = #{email }, TELNO = #{tel }, ZIP = #{postNumber }, ADDR = #{addr }, DADDR = #{daddr }, ENDST_NO = #{endst } WHERE INSTR_NO = #{instrNo }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INSTR_INFO (INSTR_NO, KORN_FLNM, USER_BRDT, EML_ADDR, TELNO, ZIP, ADDR, DADDR, GENDER_CD, USER_NO, ENDST_NO) SELECT CONCAT('L', YEAR(CURDATE()) , LPAD(COALESCE(MAX(SUBSTR(INSTR_NO , 6)), 0) + 1, 5, '0')), #{newName },#{newBirth },#{newEmail },#{newTel },#{newPostNum },#{newAddr },#{newDaddr },#{newGender },#{newUserNo },#{newEndstNo } FROM INSTR_INFO WHERE SUBSTR(INSTR_NO, 2, 4) = YEAR(CURDATE())
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_INFO SET PSWD = SUBSTR(#{newTel }, -4), USER_ID = (SELECT ii.INSTR_NO FROM INSTR_INFO ii WHERE USER_NO = #{newUserNo } ) WHERE USER_NO = #{newUserNo }
mapper.select: SELECT ii.INSTR_NO AS INSTR_INFO , si.INSTR_NO AS SBJCT_INSTR , ci.RPRS_INSTR_NO AS CRCLM_INFO FROM INSTR_INFO ii LEFT JOIN SBJCT_INSTR si ON ii.INSTR_NO = si.INSTR_NO LEFT JOIN CRCLM_INFO ci ON ii.INSTR_NO = ci.RPRS_INSTR_NO WHERE ii.INSTR_NO = #{instrNo } GROUP BY INSTR_INFO
